summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6419 for the improvement of Madrona Place East from East Denny Way to East John Street; and certain other streets and avenues by constructing underground utilities lines and a residential street lighting system; under Ordinance 98740, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
